label.title: EXBeacon Platform
label.mapRatioSetting: How to set the map ratio
label.name: Name
label.subject: subject
label.settingDescription: * A description will be displayed if you move the cursor to the key and item name.
label.zoneAdjustPosition: Adjust position and size to the new map ratio

APP.SAAS_DOMAIN: SAAS domain::Set up the SAAS domain string to continue tenantCd of url.
APP.POSITION_WITH_AREA: Position(list) display screen area column display::The area column is displayed on the position (list) display screen. true: Display, false: Hide.
APP.SPLIT_UPLOAD_SIZE: Division upload size threshold（Byte）:: Set up the division upload size threshold（Byte）.
APP.SPLIT_UPLOAD_SIZE_IE: Division upload size threshold（Byte）（for IE）::Set up the division upload size threshold（Byte）for IE
APP.MAX_IMAGE_SIZE: Maximum image size that can be uploaded(Byte)::Set up the maximum image size that can be uploaded(Byte).
APP.MAX_IMAGE_ZIP_SIZE: Maximum image zip size(Byte)::Set up the maximum image zip size(Byte)
APP.AREA_THUMBNAIL_MAX: Maximum width / height for thumbnail resizing (area)::Set up the the maximum width / height for thumbnail resizing (area)
APP.POT_THUMBNAIL_MAX: Maximum width / height for thumbnail resizing(pot)::Set up the maximum width / height for thumbnail resizing (pot)
APP.POSITION_SUMMARY_START: Positioning csv download start time（hours）::Set up the positioning csv download（hours）.
APP.POSITION_SUMMARY_END: Positioning csv download end time（hours）:: Set up the positioning csv download end time（hours）
APP.POSITION_SUMMARY_INTERVAL: Positioning csv download interval（minutes）::Set up the positioning csv download interval（minutes）
APP.POSITION_SUMMARY_RECEIVE_COUNT: Transmission frequency threshold in positioning ::Set up the transmission frequency threshold in positioning.

COMMON.VERSION: Version information::Set up the version information.
COMMON.TIME_ZONE: Time Zone::Set up the time zone to determine midnight.
COMMON.AUTO_RELOAD: Automatic reload interval::Set up the automatic reload interval in milliseconds.★

SYS.TIMEOUT: Timeout::Set up the time of session timeout in milliseconds.
SYS.STATE_EXPIRE_TIME: Cache expire time:: Set up the expire time of master date acquired from the server in milliseconds.

MENU.SHOW_MENU_LINK: Menu link::Add a link to the menu. If an image file is specified, the link will be an image file link.
MENU.SHOW_MENU_LINK_URL: Menu link URL::Set up the link URL that was set in the Menu link.
MENU.TOP_PAGE: Top page::Set up the Top screen to be display after log in.
MENU.LOGIN_PAGE: login page path::Set up the login page path.
MENU.AZLOGIN_PAGE: AD login page path::Set up the AD login page path.
MENU.ERROR_PAGE: Error page path::Set up the error page path.

GATEWAY.LOST_TIME: Not received status decision time(Gateway):: Devices which have passed the set time from the last received time will be lost.Set up in milliseconds.
GATEWAY.UNDETECT_TIME: Undetected status decision time(Gateway):: Devices which have passed the time set from the last reception time will be undetected.Set up in milliseconds.

TELEMETRY.LOST_TIME: Not received status decision time(EXB status monitorEXB status monitor) :: Devices that have passed the time set from the last received time will be lost status.Set up in milliseconds.
TELEMETRY.UNDETECT_TIME: Undetected status decision time (EXB status monitoring):: Devices that have passed the time set from the last reception time will be undetected.Set up in milliseconds.
TELEMETRY.WITH_POWER_LEVEL: Use battery level in EXB status monitoring screen::Display battery level in EXB status monitoring screen.★

POS.AUTO_RELOAD: Position history automatic reload interval::Set the interval for performing automatic reloading of position history in the position (map) screen in milliseconds. ★
POS.TRANSPARENT_TIME: Semi-transparent status decision time::The device which has passed the set up time from the last reception time will become semi-transparent.Set up in milliseconds.
POS.LOST_TIME: Not received time decision time::Tx which has passed the set time or more from the last reception time will be lost state. Set up in milliseconds.
POS.UNDETECT_TIME: Undetected status decision time::Tx which has passed more than the time set from the last reception time will be undetected. Set up in milliseconds.
POS.TX_POS_ONE_TO_ONE: Display only one Tx Tag in one place.::Only display one Tx in one place
POS.RSSI_MIN: RSSI lower limit::Set up the lower limit of RSSI.
POS.MOVING_AVERAGE: Number of position history to be aggregated at positioning:: When positioning, it will be calculated by averaging the set number of position history.
POS.MOVING_AVERAGE_TIME: Moving average::Set up the moving average time that the server uses when aggregating location information.
POS.MULTI_POSITIONING_NUM: Multipoint positioning::Set up the number of multipoint positioning
POS.PROHIBIT_ALERT: Use prohibited area::Use prohibited alert area
POS.PROHIBIT_GROUP_ZONE: Prohibited area inaccessible group setting::Set up the group CD with zone CDs that can not enter in the prohibited area.
POS.LOST_ALERT: Use critical parts carrying out detection alert::Set up the method for notifying the critical parts carrying out detection alert. Possible to set up values are{LOST_ALERT}
POS.LOST_ALERT_TIME: Important goods removal detection alert threshold::Specify the conditions for alerting detection of important goods removal detection. Notifies when the threshold (milliseconds) is exceeded after moving from the specified zone.
POS.LOST_GROUP_ZONE: Critical parts group setting::Set up the group CD with zone CDs to be handled a critical parts.
POS.USE_LEGEND: Use legend::Display the legend on the position (map) screen.★
POS.SHOW_DETECTED_COUNT: Display the number of detections::Display the number of detected device on the position(map)screen.★
POS.SHOW_TOILET: Display toilet information::Display the status of toilet empty on the position(map)★
POS.SHOW_TX_NO_OWNER: Display Tx not related to person & thing::Display Tx not relate to person & thing

WITH.CATEGORY: Use category in position (map) screen::Display category in position (map) screen
WITH.GROUP: Use group in position (map) screen::Display group in position (map) screen

PROHIBIT.DUPLICATE_MAIL_TIME: Duplicate alert notification limit (E-mail)::Prevents notification by e-mail when an alert with the same content is sent within the set up time. Set up in milliseconds.
PROHIBIT.LED_ON_TIME: Absense LED lighting time::Set up the absense LED lighting time(milliseconds).
PROHIBIT.LED_STOP_TIME: Absense LED lighting end time::Set up the lighting end time (millisecond) of the absence LED.

LOST.DUPLICATE_MAIL_TIME: Duplicate alert notification limit (E-mail)::Prevents notification by e-mail when an alert with the same content is sent within the set up time. Set up in milliseconds.

$PLUGIN.FILTER: Use detailed filter on position screen::Use plug-in to display detailed filter on position screen

POS.HIDE_TIME: Absense interval setting::Set up the interval (milliseconds) to be considered as absent

SENSOR.TX_SENSOR: Tx sensor type::Set up the type of Tx sesor. Possible to set up value are as follows.★{SENSOR}

MEDITAG.DOWN_RED_TIME: Falls notice time::When a MEDiTAG user falls over, the MEDiTAG will be displayed in a red frame for a set up time only. Set up in milliseconds.

SENSOR.USE_PRESSURE: Use pressure sensor:: Use pressure sensor.★
SENSOR.SHOW_MAGNET_ON_PIR: Use magnet sensor on Usage screen::Use magnet sensor on Usage screen
SENSOR.MAGNET_ON_IS_USED: Display setting of magnet sensor::If set up to TRUE, [USE] is displayed when the sensor is ON.If set up to FALSE,[USE] is display with the sensor OFF.

LED.AUTO_OFF_TIME: LED auto turn off time::Set up the time from turning on the LED until turning off automatically in seconds. If 0 is specified, the light does not turn off automatically.

SENSOR.USE_HUMIDITY_ALERT: Usehumidity alerts on Temperature & Humidity screen::Use Humidity alerts on Temperature & Humidity screen.
SENSOR.USE_THERMOH_HEATMAP: Use Heatmap on Temperature & Humidity::Heatmap can be switched on Temperature & Humidity screen.
SENSOR.USE_THERMOH_TOOLTIP: Use Tooltip on Temperature & Humidity::Allow Tooltips to display inforamation of device on which the cursor is placed on the Temperature & Humidity.

TEMPERATURE.LINE_HOUR_START: Temperature & Humidity graph start time::Set up the start time of Temperature& Humidity graph.Set up from 0 to 24(hour)
TEMPERATURE.LINE_HOUR_END: Temperature & Humidity graph end time::Set up the end time of Temperature & Humidity graph.Set up from 0 to 24(hour)

HEATMAP.USE_INDIVIDUAL: Specify an individual on the Heatmap screen::Specify and individuals for display on the heat map screen

POS_LIST.WITH: Item to be displayed on position display (list)::Set the display item to position display (list). The possible to set up values are as follows.★{POS_LIST}

POS_STACK.USE_POPUP: Items to switch to popup in Position (Whole)::When you click the Tx icon in the Position (Whole), it will be set to switch to the popup. When this setting is true, popup display is enabled.

ADJUST_POPUP.X: Items to adjust the horizontal position of the popup::Adjust the horizontal position of the Tx popup in the Position (Whole). Adjust the position to the right with plus and to the left with minus.
ADJUST_POPUP.Y: Items to adjust the vertical position of the popup::Adjust the Tx popup vertical position of the Position (Whole). Adjust the position downwards with plus and upwards with minus.

TX.WITH: Item used on Tx screen::Set up the item used on Tx screen. The possible values are as follows.★{TX}
TX.MAJOR_REQUIRED: Require major on Tx screen::Make major required when registering or updating Tx.
TX.BTX_MINOR: Use btxId and minor on Tx screen::Use either btxId or minor, or both on Tx screen. Set up either btxId, minor, or both.★

EXB.SENSOR: Type of EXBeacon sensor::Set up the type of EXBeacon sensor.The possible to set up values are as follows. ★{SENSOR}
EXB.DEVICEID_TYPE: Use device ID and device ID (hexadecimal) on EXBeacon screen::Use device ID, device ID (hexadecimal) or both on EXBeacon screen. Set up deviceId, deviceIdX, or both
EXB.MULTI_SENSOR: Set up multiple sensors in EXBeacon::Multiple sensors can be set on the EXBeacon screen.
EXB.SENSOR_MAX: Maximum number of sensors set in EXBeacon::Set up the maximum number of sensors that can be set on the EXBeacon screen.
EXB.WITH: Items to be added to ExService MasterRequestExService::Set up items to be added to MasterRequest in a character string list (separated by commas).

LOCATION.WITH: Items used in the location layout screen::Set up the items used in the location layout screen. Possible to set up values ​​are ★{LOCATION}

TYPE.WITH: Location type choices::Set up location type choices. Numeric value and string like「1:work,2:wip,3:qa,4:storage」Set the values ​​separated by colons. The explanation about the setting value is {LOCATION_TYPE}

LOCATION.EXT_DEF: Location extension item::Define the extension items that can be set for the location in JSON format.

USER.WITH: Items used on the user screen::Set up the items used on the user screen. The possible to set up values are as follows. ★{USER}

POT.WITH: Item used in person & thing screen::Set up the items used in person & thing screen. The possible to set up values are as follows.★{POT}
POT.MULTI_TX: Register multiple Tx to person & thing::Enable registration of multiple Tx on person & thing screen.
POT.TX_MAX: Maximum number of Tx to be registered in person & thing::Enable registration of multiple Tx on person & thing screen.
POT.EXT_DEF: Person & thing extension item::Define extension items that can be set to people & thing in JSON format.

PERSON.WITH: Items used on the person screen::Set up the items used on the person screen. Possible to set up values ​​are★{POT}
PERSON.MULTI_TX: Register multiple Tx for a person :: Enable multiple Tx registration on the person screen
PERSON.TX_MAX: Maximum number of Tx to be registered for person :: Set up the maximum number of Tx that can be registered on the person screen
PERSON.EXT_DEF: Person extended items :: Defines extension items that can be set for person in JSON format

THING.WITH: Items to be used on the object screen :: Set up the items to be used on the object screen. Possible to set up values ​​are ★{POT}
THING.MULTI_TX: Register multiple Tx to the object :: Enable multiple Tx to be registered on the object screen
THING.TX_MAX: Maximum number of Tx registered in the object :: Set up the maximum number of Tx that can be registered in the object screen.
THING.EXT_DEF: Expansion Item :: Defines the extension items that can be set for the object in JSON format.

OTHER.WITH: Items used on the thing (other) screen::Set up the items to be used on the thing (other) screen. The values that can be set are as follows.★{POT}
OTHER.MULTI_TX: Register multiple Tx in thing(other)::Multiple Tx can be registered on the thing (other) screen.
OTHER.TX_MAX: Maximum number of Tx to be registered in the thing (other)::Set the maximum number of Tx that can be registered on the Things(other) screen.
OTHER.EXT_DEF: Product (other) extension items::Define the extension items that can be set for thing (other) in JSON format.

CATEGORY.TYPES: Types that can be selected on the category details screen :: Set up the types that can be used on the category details screen. Possible to set up values ​​are{CATEGORY_TYPES}
CATEGORY.WITH: Items used on the category screen::Set up the items to be used on the category screen.
CATEGORY.EXT_DEF: Category extension item::Define the extension items that can be set for the category in JSON format.

GROUP.WITH: Items used on the group screen::Set up the items to be used on the group screen.
GROUP.EXT_DEF: Group extension item::Define the extension items that can be set for the group in JSON format.

ZONE.TYPES: Type that can be selected on the Zone (class) detail screen::Set up the types that can be used on the Zone (class) detail screen. The values that can be set are as follows.{ZONE_TYPES}
ZONE.WITH: Items used on the Zone (class) screen::Set the items to be used on the zone (classification) screen.
ZONE.EXT_DEF: Zone extension items::Define the extension items that can be set in the zone in JSON format.

SETTING.DISABLED_THEME: Do not set theme color :: Disable theme color setting in personal settings screen

NOTIFY.MIDIUM_TYPES: Selectable notification media on notification template screen::Set up the types that can be selected on the category screen. The possible to set up values are as follows.{NOTIFY_MIDIUM}
NOTIFY.STATE_TYPES: Selectable notification media on notification template screen::Set up the selectable notification media on notification template screen. The possible to set up values are as follows.{NOTIFY_STATE}

ANALYSIS.DATETIME_DEFAULT: Flow line analysis, initial period of heat map screen From::The default value of the period From displayed on the flow analysis, heat map screen is the past date of the time set from the current date. The unit is set in unit of initial period From of flow line analysis, heat map screen
ANALYSIS.DATETIME_DEFAULT_UNIT: Unit of flow line analysis, initial period of heat map screen From::Flow line analysis, unit of initial period From heat map screen:Set the unit of flow line analysis, initial period from heat map screen From. The possible values are:{ANALYSIS_UNIT}
ANALYSIS.DATETIME_LIMIT: Flowing line analysis, upper limit of interval interval of heat map screen::Set up the upper limit of number of days that can be displayed on moving line analysis, heat map screen
ANALYSIS.DATETIME_INTERVAL: Flow line analysis, heat map screen period interval ::Flow line analysis, when period From is selected on the heat map screen, the future date for the time set in the period To is automatically entered.Set up in unit.

STAY_SUM.LOST_LIMIT: Staying time count lost decision time::Set up lost decision time when counting stay time in seconds
STAY_SUM.ABSENT_LIMIT: Staying time count absent decision time::Set up absent decision time when counting stay time in seconds。
STAY_SUM.PARSENT_DIGIT:
Number of decimal places when showing presence ratio::Set up the number of decimal places when showing presence ratio.The possible to set up values are as follows.{SUM_PARSENT_DIGIT}
※ If you set the power of 10, it will be the digit of the exponent.
STAY_SUM.AXIS_FILL_GAP: Display 0 items on the horizontal axis of stay time summary::Display 0 items on the horizontal axis of stay time summary.The possible to set up values are as follows.{SUM_AXIS_FILL_GAP}
STAY_SUM.ENABLE_DISPLAY_SPECIFIED: Whether or not to display the display button on the daily stay analysis screen::Set up the display control of the display specification button that can switch the display of the zone category and area.
STAY_SUM.UNIT_HOUR: Display setting for stay time summary (hour)::If the maximum value in axis units exceeds the set second, the display of stay time total is displayed in time units.
STAY_SUM.UNIT_MINUTE: Display setting for stay time summary (minute)::If the maximum value in axis units exceeds the set second, the display of stay time total is displayed in time units.
STAY_SUM.SCALE_TIMES: Stay rate screen graph scale time (hours)::Set up time (hours) to be displayed on stay rate screen graph scale (ignore if not match).
STAY_SUM.GRAPH_LIMIT: Actual value of daily stay analysis graph (%) :: If the data time for the total time to be aggregated is less than the set percentage, it will not be displayed on the graph.
STAY_SUM.OTHER_COLOR: Stay rate and other colors::Set up the color of the stay rate in other cases.
STAY_SUM.PROCESS_ZONE_IDS: Zone ID list for stay time calculation::Set up the zone ID for total stay time in a numerical list (separated by commas).
STAY_SUM.WORKING_END: Work end time for stay time calculation::Set up the work end time for total stay time in hhmm format.
STAY_SUM.WORKING_HOURS_PER_DAY: Working hours for total stay time::Set up the working hours (hours) per day for total stay time.
STAY_SUM.WORKING_START: Work start time for stay time aggregation::Set up the work start time for total stay time in hhmm format.

TX_MON.WITH: Item used Tx monitoring screen:: Set up the item used Tx monitor screen. The possible to set up values are as follows.★{TX_MON}
TX_MON.WITH_SENSOR: Merge the sensor information with the data of Tx monitor screen.::Include the sensor information in the information displayd in the Tx status monitor screen. Included data is battery level and last acquired time. Possible to set up values are as follows.{SENSOR}
TX_MON.POWER_LEVEL_GOOD: Battery level setting(good)::Make the battery level above the set values is good.
TX_MON.POWER_LEVEL_WARN: Battery level setting(down)::Decrease the battery level above the set value and below the battery level.

SENSOR_LIST.WITH: Item use with sensor history and sensor currentlist screen::Set up the item use with sensor history and sensor currentlist screen. The possible to set up values are as follows. ★{SENSOR_LIST}

SENSORGRAPH.SENSOR: Sensor type::Set up the type of sensor. The values that can be set are as follows.★{SENSOR_NONE}{SENSOR}
SENSORGRAPH.WITH_DEVICE: Using selection devices in the sensor grap::Using the selection device in sensor graph.
SENSORGRAPH.CSV_IMMEDIATE: Output latest value to csv of sensor graph screen::Include the latest value information to csv downloaded on the sensor graph screen.

HISTORY_EXC.SORT: Sort the date of history screen used ::Sort the date of location information (Exc) and sensor information (Exc).The possible to set up values are as follows.{SORT}

TXDETAIL.ITEMS: Item to be displayed deatail pop-up of the position(map)screen.::Set up the item to be displayed deatail pop-up of the positioning(map)screen.The possible to set up values are as follows.★{TXDETAIL}
TXDETAIL.NO_UNREGIST_THUMB: Does not show unregistered thumbnails in the details popup of the position (map) screen::When the thumbnail is not registered in the selected Tx on the position (map) screen, set the thumbnail to not be displayed in the details pop-up.

ACTIVITY.STACK_TYPE: Aggregation method of activity results::Specify the aggregation method of activity results.(location zoneCategory)

MEETING.GROUP_BY: Aggregation unit of meeting room use results::Specify the total unit of the meeting room use results.(EXB location)
MEETING.AXIS_TYPE: Display unit of meeting room use results::Specify the display unit of the meeting room.(EXB location zone)
MEETING.MAX_NUM: Maximum value of meeting room usage total

SVC.SLACK_CHANNEL: Slack Channel name::Set up the Slack channel name for sending notification information.
SVC.SLACK_TOKEN: Slack API Token::Set up the token to use the Slack API.

STAY_SUM.START: Start time of stay time summary batch::Set up the start time of stay time summary batch. Setting value is「Hour × 100 + Minute × 1」
STAY_SUM.END: End time of stay time summary batch::Set up the end time of stay time summary batch. Setting value is「Hour × 100 + Minute × 1」
STAY_SUM.INTERVAL: Time to consider stay time summary batch as stay::Set up the threshold of time to be judged as stay data in stay time summary batch in seconds. When staying for a set time or more,it will be judged as stay data.
STAY_SUM.CALC_BY: Summary unit of stay time summary batch::Set up the unit of data to be summarized in staying time summary batch. The possible to set up values are as follows.{STAY_SUM_CALC_BY}
STAY_SUM.ADJUST_TIME: Maximum time to be corrected for stay-time summary batch::Set up the data in seconds not to be corrected in stay-time summary batch. Stay time data exceeding this number will not be corrected.
STAY_SUM.REAL_TIME: Update stay time real time::Calculate stay time after positioning process in real time. If this setting is TRUE, periodic batch process is basically turned off.

PRESENCE.INTERVAL: Time to consider presence batch as same status::Set up the threshold of time to be judged as same data in presence batch in seconds. When staying for a set time or more,it will be judged as same data.

POS.CACHE_TIME: Server cache effective time::Set up the effective time of cache data accumulated by the server in milliseconds.

PROXIMITY.USE_TXAIR: TXAir transactional analysis::Set up whether to do TXAir transactional analysis.
PROXIMITY.USE_MEETING_ROOM: Transactional analysis per conference room ::Set up whether to do exchange analysis per conference room
PROXIMITY.EXCLOUD_RAWLOG_DIR: File path syslog:: Set up the file path to the mounted syslog.
PROXIMITY.BLANK_RANGE: Continues transaction time::Set up the transaction time of the transactional analysis batch in milliseconds
PROXIMITY.MIN_RANGE: Minimum transcation time::Set up the minimum transaction time of the transactional analysis batch in milliseconds.
PROXIMITY.UNIT_HOUR: Aggregation unit (time) of stay time aggregation::When the maximum value of the axis unit exceeds the specified seconds, the display of total stay time is displayed in units of hours.
PROXIMITY.UNIT_MINUTE: Total unit of stay time total (minutes)::When the maximum value in the axis unit exceeds the specified seconds, the display of the total stay time is displayed in minutes.

PROXIMITY_TASK.BLANK_RANGE: Time when the exchange time is considered broken::Set up the time (milliseconds) for which the AC time is considered to be interrupted.
PROXIMITY_TASK.MIN_RANGE: Minimum exchange time::Set up the minimum AC time (milliseconds).

WORKLOAD.PAUSE_TIMEOUT: Time for judging interruption of AC tabulation :: If the OUT time has not been updated for the specified number of seconds, it is considered to be interrupted.

PROCESS.LOCATION_TYPE_TO_RELEASE_TX_POT: Tag and POT unlinking location :: Set up the type of tag and POT unlinking location.

AD.GROUP_NAMES: Only groups that match the regular expression string specified here will be synchronized from Active Directory.::Applies only when using Active Directory.

LED.ENABLE: Toilet LED lighting function::Use the toilet LED lighting function.
LED.RGB: Toilet LED lighting color::Specify the color when the toilet LED is lit.

SVC.GUARD_TIME: Last received date and time setting (minutes)::Make settings so that the last reception date and time in each security zone has passed the specified minutes in the security target acquisition API.

EXCLOUD.AUTH_HEADER: EXCloud API key::Set up the API key when using EXCloud API. The content is not displayed because it is confidential information. Only setting is possible.
EXCLOUD.TX_REG: Use EXCloud TX registration API::Whether to use EXCloud's TX registration API.

ENTER.AUTO_PAGE: Automatic transition of pager of entrance table::Automatic transition when paged. The values that can be set are as follows.{ENTER_AUTO_PAGE}
ENTER.START_TIME: Start date and time of no accidents and no violations in the Entrance / Exit table::Specify the start date and time of no accident and no violation in UNIX TIME (millisecond).
ENTER.AUTO_PAGER_MSEC: [Entrance / Exit table]Automatic pager update interval (ms)::[Entrance / Exit table]Specify the automatic pager update interval (milliseconds).

POSITION.INTERVAL: Execution interval of position batch::Set up execution interval of position batch in milliseconds.

SENSOR_1.INTERVAL: Execution interval of Temperature & Humidity batch::Set up execution interval of Temperature & Humidity batch in milliseconds.

SENSOR_2.INTERVAL: Execution interval of PIR::Set up execution interval of PIR in milliseconds.

SENSOR_3.INTERVAL: Execution interval of Thermopile batch::Set up execution interval of Thermopile batch in milliseconds.

SENSOR_5.INTERVAL: Execution interval of MEDiTAG batch:: Set up execution interval of MEDiTAG batch in milliseconds.

SENSOR_6.INTERVAL: Execution interval of Magnet sensor batch::Set up execution interval of Magnet sensor batch in milliseconds

SENSOR_8.INTERVAL: Execution interval of pressure sensor::Set up execution interval of pressure sensor in milliseconds.

SENSOR_9.INTERVAL: Environment sensor batch execution interval::Set up the execution interval of the environment sensor batch in milliseconds.

SENSOR_10.INTERVAL: Execution interval of thermopile motion sensor batch::Set up the execution interval of the thermopile human sensor batch in milliseconds.

SENSOR_11.INTERVAL: Execution interval of thermopile environment sensor batch::Set up the execution interval of the thermopile environment sensor batch in milliseconds.

MONITOR.INTERVAL: Execution interval of monitor batch::Set up execution interval of monitor batch in milliseconds.

UTILIZATION.CRON: The time for Cron to calculates usage information::Set up the time for Cron to aggregate usage information. Set up it in Cron format.

STAY_SUM.CRON: The time for Cron calculates stay time::Set up the time for Cron calculates stay time. Set up it in Cron format.

PROXIMITY.CRON:
Time for Cron to do transactional analysis::Set up the time for Cron to do transcational analysis. Set in time Cron format time.
APP.SVC.STAY_SUM.REAL_TIME：Can not be used togthere with transactional analysis
APP.BATCH.PROXIMITY.CRON：When setting, turn off regular batch processing of stay time.

ENTER_COUNT.CRON: Time for Cron to calculate the number of visitors::Set up the time for Cron to calculate the number of visitors. Set up the time in Cron format.

LOST_ZONE.INTERVAL: Important component take-out detection alert batch execution interval :: Set up the execution interval of the important component take-out detection alert batch in milliseconds.

PROHIBIT_ZONE.INTERVAL: Prohibited Zone Alert Batch Execution Interval :: Set up the prohibited interval alert batch execution interval in milliseconds.

PRESENCE.INTERVAL: Teams presence batch processing time specification :: Set up the execution interval of fetching presence data with Microsoft Graph.

AD_SYNC.CRON: AD synchronous batch processing time specification :: Synchronize with Active Directory at the specified time.

MANAGE.SETTING_CATEGORY: System settings to be published::Set up the category to be displayed on the system setting screen for customers.

TOILET.AUTO_RELOAD: Perform automatic reload on the toilet full vacancy display screen::Automatic reloading is performed on the toilet vacancy display screen.

PROXIMITY.UNIT_HOUR: Aggregation unit (time) of stay time aggregation::When the maximum value of the axis unit exceeds the specified seconds, the display of total stay time is displayed in units of hours.
PROXIMITY.UNIT_MINUTE: Total unit of stay time total (minutes)::When the maximum value in the axis unit exceeds the specified seconds, the display of the total stay time is displayed in minutes.

TIME.SUCCESS_COMPLETE: Normal end time of process management screen (seconds)::If the last step is longer than the set time, it is regarded as a normal end.
TIME.LATE: Excess error time of process control screen (seconds)::If the time other than the last step is longer than the set time, it is regarded as an excess error.

DISP.FONT_ICON_ADJUST_SCALE: Font size factor for text in icon
DISP.IS_SCALE_ICON_TEXT: Auto-scale setting of text in icon::If set to true, the text in the icon will be automatically scaled.
DISP.DUMMY_ICON_TEXT: Dummy text when auto scaling is not set::Set the text to be displayed in the icon when the text auto scale setting in the icon is set to false.
DISP.MAP_FIT: Map fit settings::Whether the map fits within the screen display range.width or height or both
DISP.MAP_FIT_MOBILE: Map fit settings (for mobile)::Whether the map fits within the screen display range.width or height or both
DISP.PIR_LINE_COLOR: Line color of human sensor graph
DISP.THERMOPILE_LINE_COLOR: Line color of thermopile sensor graph
DISP.MAGNET_LINE_COLOR: Line color of magnet sensor graph
DISP.PRESSURE_LINE_COLOR: Line color of pressure sensor graph
DISP.AMBIENT_LIGHT_COLOR: Line color of illuminance sensor graph
DISP.SOUND_NOISE_COLOR: Line color of noise sensor graph
DISP.HEART_RATE_LINE_COLOR: MEDiTAG sensor graph line color (heart rate)
DISP.STEP_LINE_COLOR: Line color of step count graph
DISP.DOWN_COUNT_LINE_COLOR: Line color of falling number graph
DISP.TXDETAIL_DIFF: Display position difference of Tx details::Distance from left edge of popup to center of balloon
DISP.TXSENSOR_POPUP_SIZE: Height of Tx sensor display pop-up
DISP.INSTALLATION.FONT_SIZE: Text size of RSSI icon on installation support screen

PROHIBIT.TWINKLE_TIME: Blink interval at detection of prohibited area :: Set up the blink interval in milliseconds.
PROHIBIT.FONT_SIZE: Character size of prohibited area display
PROHIBIT.BG_COLOR: Background color when displaying prohibited areas :: Set up including alpha value.

MENU.SHOW_NAV: Display Top menu::Display menu at the top of the screen.
MENU.SHOW_SIDEBAR: Display side menu.:: Display menu on the left of the screen.
MENU.SHOW_LOGO: Display Logo::Display logo on the upper left of the screen. If false, display application name.
MENU.SHOW_HELP: Display help::Displays help in the menu at the top right of the screen.
MENU.THEME: Default theme::Set up the default theme color. The possible to set up values are as follows.{THEME}

TX.R: Radius of Tx icon:: Set up the size of Tx displayed on the position(map) screen.★
TX.FIX_R: Radius of Tx icon::Set up the size of Tx displayed on the position (map) screen legend icon, position display (overall), category, and group screen.
TX.ROUNDRECT_RADIUS: Round radius of Tx icon::Set up the roundness of the four corners to Tx set to the rounded square icon.
TX.BGCOLOR: Default background color for Tx icons::Set up the background color for Tx icons that do not belong to either category or group. Set up with a color code other than #.
TX.COLOR: Default text color of Tx icon::Set up the text color of the Tx icon to which neither category nor group belongs. Set up with a color code other than #.
TX.STROKE_COLOR: Default border color for Tx icons::Set up the border color for Tx icons to which neither category nor group belongs. Set up with a color code other than #.
TX.ALPHA: Absent time Tx Icon Transmissive Value::Set up the transmit value when Tx is absence.Set up as a decimal value from 0 (transparent) to 1 (opaque).
TX.LOST_ALPHA: Absent Tx Icon Transmissive Value::Set up the transmit value when Tx is absent. Set up it as a decimal value from 0 (transparent) to 1 (opaque).
TX.DISPLAY_PRIORITY: Tx icon display color::Set up the color to be applied to the Tx icon display color from the display color set in the category or group. Possible to set up values are {COLOR_TYPE}
TX.ABSENT_ZONE_DISPLAY_TYPES: Type of Tx icon to be displayed for absence display zone::undetected: undetected, lost:lost, absent:absent zone
TX.R_ABSOLUTE: Match Tx radius to screen resolution
TX.STROKE_WIDTH: Default border width when displaying Tx
TX.DIV_2: Magnification to shift when arranging two Txs vertically and horizontally when they overlap
TX.DIV_3: Magnification to be shifted when three are arranged side by side when Tx overlaps
TX.HORIZON: Number of columns when displaying TX icon tiles
TX.VERTICAL: Number of lines when displaying TX icon tiles

FIXED_POS.APPLY_COLOR: Apply fixed display settings (APP.FIXED_POS): Set up true if you want to apply the settings of colors and shapes set in: APP.FIXED_POS to fixed display.
FIXED_POS.SHAPE: Fixed display Tx icon shape :: Set up the value of SHAPE of Constants.
FIXED_POS.IN_ZONE_BGCOLOR: Color in fixed zone of fixed display Tx icon
FIXED_POS.OUT_ZONE_BGCOLOR: Color outside fixed zone of fixed display Tx icon
FIXED_POS.UNDETECT_BGCOLOR: Undetected color of fixed display Tx icon
FIXED_POS.LOST_BGCOLOR: Fixed display Tx icon disappearing color

TX_NUM.R: Tx quantity icon radius :: Set up the size of Tx displayed on the position (map) screen ★
TX_NUM.ROUNDRECT_RADIUS: Tx Quantity Icon Rounded Radius :: Set up the roundness of the four corners for the Tx set in the rounded rectangle icon.
TX_NUM.BGCOLOR: Default background color for Tx quantity icons :: Set up the background color of Tx icons to which neither category nor group belongs. Set up with a color code including #.
TX_NUM.COLOR: Default text color of Tx quantity icon :: Set up the text color of Tx icon that does not belong to category or group. Set up by color code including #.
TX_NUM.STROKE_COLOR: Default border color of Tx quantity icon :: Set up the border color of Tx icon that does not belong to category or group. Set up  with color code including #.
TX_NUM.STROKE_WIDTH: Default border width of Tx quantity icon :: Set up the border width of Tx icons that do not belong to any category or group. Set up with a color code including #.

TOOLTIP_ITEMS.TX_LOCATION_NAME: Display when selecting quantity on the position(map) screen :: Display the location name in the tooltip displayed when selecting the quantity on the position (map) screen.
TOOLTIP_ITEMS.TX_LOCATION_TYPE: Display when selecting quantity on the position (map) screen :: Display the location type name in the tooltip displayed when selecting the quantity on the position (map) screen.

TX_NUM.TOOLTIP_FONT: Tooltip font displayed when selecting quantity on position (map) screen :: Set up the font of tooltip displayed when selecting quantity on position (map) screen. Font size And set the font type.
TX_NUM.TOOLTIP_COLOR: Font color of tooltip displayed when selecting quantity on position (map) screen :: Set up the font color of tooltip displayed when selecting quantity on position(map) screen. Set up with color code including #.
TX_NUM.TOOLTIP_BORDERCOLOR: Set up the border color of tooltip to be displayed when selecting quantity on position (map) screen. Set up with color code including #.
TX_NUM.TOOLTIP_BGCOLOR: Tooltip background color displayed when selecting quantity on the position (map) screen :: Set up the background color of the tooltip displayed when selecting the quantity on the position (map) screen. Set up with a color code including #.
TX_NUM.TOOLTIP_ROUNDRECT: Tooltip round radius displayed when selecting quantity on the position (map) screen::Sets up the roundness of the four corners of the tooltip displayed when selecting the quantity on the position (map) screen.

SIZE.W: Icon size (width)on Location setting screen::Set up the width of the icon displayed on the location setting screen.
SIZE.H: Icon size (height) on Location setting screen::Set up the height of the icon displayed on the location setting screen.

EXB_LOC.BGCOLOR_DEFAULT: Icon background color of place layout setting screen (Tx related)::Set up the default background color of the icon associated with Tx displayed on the place setting screen. Set with a color code including #.
EXB_LOC.BGCOLOR_DEFAULT_NOTX: Icon background color of the location arrangement setting screen (when Tx is not related)::Set up the default background color of the icons that are not associated with Tx displayed on the location setting screen. Set up with a color code including #.
EXB_LOC.COLOR: Set up the font color of the icons displayed on the location setting screen. Set up with a color code including #.
EXB_LOC.MAX_FONT_SIZE: Icon maximum font of location arrangement setting screen::Set up the maximum font size of the icons displayed on the location setting screen.
EXB_LOC.BGCOLOR_PATTERN: Icon background color of place layout setting screen (Tx related)::Set up the background color of the icon associated with Tx displayed on the place setting screen. It can be specified for each location type and sensor type. Set up a color code that includes a value indicating the location type and #, separated by a colon, such as [1: # FFFFFF, 2: # FFFFFF, pir: # FFFFFF, magnet: #FFFFFF]. The following values can be set for the type of sensor.{SENSOR_TYPE}
EXB_LOC.BGCOLOR_PATTERN_NOTX: Icon background color of the location arrangement setting screen (Tx is not related)::Set up the background color of the icons that are not associated with Tx and displayed on the location setting screen. It can be specified for each location type and sensor type. Set up a color code that includes a value indicating the location type and #, separated by a colon, such as [1: # FFFFFF, 2: # FFFFFF, pir: # FFFFFF, magnet: #FFFFFF]. The following values can be set for the type of sensor.{SENSOR_TYPE}
EXB_LOC.FONT: EXB icon display font for location setting
EXB_LOC.RSSI_BGCOLOR: EXB icon color for location placement settings

TOOLTIP_ITEMS.TXNAME: Display name on tooltip of Temperature & Humidity screen::Display name on tooltip for Temperature & Humidity screen
TOOLTIP_ITEMS.TEMPERATURE: Display temperature on tooltip of Temperature & Humidity screen::Display temperature on tooltip for Temperature and Humidity screen。
TOOLTIP_ITEMS.HUMIDITY: Display humidity on tooltip of  Temperature & Humidity screen::Display humidity on tooltip for Temperature & Humidity screen
TOOLTIP_ITEMS.DESCRIPTION: Display description on tooltip of Temperature & Humidity screen::Display description on tooltip for Temperature & Humidity screen
TOOLTIP_ITEMS.DATE: Display measurement date and time on tooltip of Temperature & Humidity screen::Display measurement of date and time on tooltip for Temperature & Humidity screen

THERMOH.TOOLTIP_COLOR: Tooltip text color of Temperature & Humidity screen::Set up the text color of the tooltip displayed on the Temperature & Humidity screen. Set up it with a color code including #.
THERMOH.TOOLTIP_BORDERCOLOR: Tooltip border color for Temperature & Humidity screen::Set up the border color for tooltips displayed on the Temperature & Humidity screen. Set up with a color code including #
THERMOH.TOOLTIP_BGCOLOR: Tooltip background color for Temperature & Humidity screen::Set up the background color of the tooltip displayed on the Temperature & Humidity screen. Set up with a color code including #
THERMOH.TOOLTIP_ROUNDRECT: Tooltip rounded radius for Temperature & Humidity screen::Set up the four corners of the tool tip to be displayed on the temperature and humidity screen.
THERMOH.ALERT_FIX_HEIGHT: Humidity alert fixed number of lines for Temperature & Humidity screenr::Set up the height to display fixed Temperature & Humidity screen humidity alert. If set to 0, this function is disabled.
THERMOH.ALERT_WEIGHT: Humidity alert character size for Temperature & Humidity screen::Set up the thickness of the humidity alert character displayed on the Temperature & Humidity screen. The setting value is a multiple of 100 (100 to 900). If you specify normal, it will be 400; if you specify bold, it will be 700.
THERMOH.DISP: Display Temperature & Humidity Screen Icon::Display Temperature & Humidity Screen Icon Set up the icon to display on the Temperature & Humidity screen. The possible to set up values are{THERMOH_DISP}
THERMOH.WITH_LABEL: Display Temperature & Humidity on Temperature & Humidity screen icon::Display Temperature & Humidity on icon displayed on Temperature & Humidity screen. Valid when DISP.THERMOH.DISP is color
THERMOH.FONT: Temperature and humidity screen icon character font::Set up the font of the icon to be displayed on the Temperature & Humidity screen. Set up the character size and font type.
THERMOH.R_SIZE: The radius of the Temperature and Humidity Screen Icon::Set up the size of the icon displayed on the Temperature & Humidity screen. This is valid when DISP.THERMOH.DISP is color.
THERMOH.COLOR: Temperature & Humidity screen icon text color::Set up the text color of the icon displayed on the Temperature & Humidity screen. Set up with a color code including #
THERMOH.CALC: How to calculate icon state of Temperature & Humidity screen::For the icon displayed on the Temperature & Humidity screen, of the discomfort index or the temperature, which numerical value is used to determine the display color is set. Valid when THERMOH_DISP is color.The possible to set up values are as follows. {THERMOH_CALC}
THERMOH.PATTERN: Icon display pattern of Temperature and Humidity Screen::Set up the display pattern of the icon displayed on the Temperature & Humidity screen. Valid when DISP.THERMOH.DISP is color.The possible to set up  value are as follows.{THERMOH_PATTERN}
THERMOH.HUMIDITY_PATTERN: Humidity alert pattern on Temperature & Humidity screen::Set the humidity alert warning pattern to be displayed on the Temperature & Humidity screen. The possible to set up values are as follows.{HUMIDITY_PATTERN}
THERMOH.DISCOMFORT_HOT: Discomfort index when displaying temperature and humidity background color when hot
THERMOH.DISCOMFORT_COMFORT: Discomfort index when displaying temperature and humidity Background color when hot
THERMOH.DISCOMFORT_COLD: Background color when discomfort index cold when displaying temperature and humidity

FLASH.WARN: Warning icon flashing cycle when displaying temperature and humidity (milliseconds)
FLASH.DANGER: Danger icon blinking cycle when displaying temperature and humidity (milliseconds)

THERMOH.ALPHA: Alpha value when displaying temperature and humidity::Set the alpha value (transparency) (0: transparent to 1: opaque). Decimal (0.5) can be set.
THERMOH.TEMPERATURE_MAX: Temperature / humidity heat map maximum value when displaying temperature / humidity
THERMOH.TEMPERATURE_MIN: Temperature / humidity heat map minimum value when displaying temperature / humidity
THERMOH.TEMPERATURE_RADIUS: Temperature / humidity heat map diameter when displaying temperature / humidity
THERMOH.TEMPERATURE_DECIMAL_DIGITS: Decimal digit of temperature when displaying temperature and humidity (zero padding)

PIR.R_SIZE: Icon radius of the human sensor screen::Set up the size of the icon displayed on the human sensor screen.★
PIR.BGCOLOR: Icon background color of the Usage screen::Set the background color of the icon displayed on the Usage screen. Set up the color code including #.
PIR.FGCOLOR: Icon character color of the Usage screen::Set the character color of the icon displayed on the Usage screen. Set the color code including #。
PIR.EMPTY_SHOW: Display an absent icon on the Usage screen::Display an absent icon on the Usage screen
PIR.EMPTY_BGCOLOR: Absent icon background for motion sensor screen::Set up the background color of the absent icon displayed on the motion sensor screen. Set up the color code including #.
PIR.MIN_COUNT: Minimum count value of presence condition of human sensor
PIR.INUSE_LABEL: Label key when motion sensor is present
PIR.EMPTY_LABEL: Label key when no human sensor is present

PRESSURE.R_SIZE: Pressure sensor icon radius of the Usage screen::Set up the size of the pressure sensor displayed on the Usage screen.★
PRESSURE.VOL_MIN: Pressure sensor use decision threshold of Usage screen::Set up the pressure sensor use decision value displayed on the human sensor screen. Decide that the value below the set value is in use.When 1200 is pressureless and the pressure is applied, the value decreases..
PRESSURE.BGCOLOR: Pressure sensor icon background for Usage screen background color::Set the background color of the pressure sensor icon displayed on the Usage screen. Set up the color code including #.
PRESSURE.FGCOLOR: Pressure sensor icon character color of Usage screen::Color of pressure sensor icon displayed on Usage screen. Set up color code including #
PRESSURE.EMPTY_SHOW: Display pressure sensor icon not used in Usage screen::Display unused pressure sensor icon in Usage screen.
PRESSURE.EMPTY_BGCOLOR: Pressure sensor icon not used for the Usage screen background color::Set up the background color of the unused pressure sensor icon on the Usage screen. Set up the color code including #.
PRESSURE.INUSE_LABEL: Label key when using pressure sensor
PRESSURE.EMPTY_LABEL: Label key when pressure sensor is not used

MEDITAG.STRESS_BG: MEDiTAG background color of position (map) screen::Set up the background color of MEDiTAG used in position (map) screen in three steps according to the stress level. Set up the color code including #.

POSITION_HISTORY.HEADERS: Item to be displayed on position history screen::Set up the items to be displayed on position display history screen. The possible to set up values are as follows.{POSITION_HISTORY}

LINE.MIN_WEIGHT: Minimum thickness of flow line displayed on the flow line analysis screen::Set up the minimum thickness of flow line displayed on the flow line analysis screen.
LINE.MAX_WEIGHT: Maximum thickness of flow line displayed on flow line analysis screen::Set up the maximum thickness of flow line displayed on flow line analysis screen.
LINE.COLOR: Color of flow line to be displayed on flow line analysis screen::Set up the color of flow line to be displayed on flow line analysis screen
LINE.OPACITY: Set up the flow line transmittance of the flow line analysis :: Transparency (0: transparent to 1: opaque). Decimal (0.5) can be set.

HEATMAP.RADIUS: The diameter of the heatmap displayed on the heatmap (position) screen::Set up the size of the heatmap displayed on the heatmap (position) screen

COMBO_BOX.W: Combo Box Width::Set up the width of the combo box in pixels.

BG_COLOR.ABSENT: Background color (absent area) color code::Set up the background color of the system setting category (absent area)
BG_COLOR.PROHIBIT: Background color (prohibit area) color code:: Sets up the background color of the system setting category (prohibit area).

ENTER.COL_CNT: [Entrance and Exit Table] Number of display columns::[Entrance and Exit Table] Specify the number of display columns.
ENTER.LOST_COLOR: [Entrance and Exit Table] Text color of lost person::[Entrance and Exit Table] Specify the text color of the lost person by color name, HEX or RGB.
ENTER.ABSENT_BGCOLOR: [Entrance and Exit Table] Background color of exiters::[Entrance and Exit Table] Specify the background color of the exited person by color name, HEX or RGB.
ENTER.ENTER_BGCOLOR: [Entrance and Exit Table] Background color of visitors::[Entrance and Exit Table] Specify the background color of visitors by color name, HEX or RGB.

TOILET.BASE_FONT_SIZE: Standard font size for toilet icons
TOILET.BASE_MARK_R: Standard vacancy icon size for toilet icons

POS_STACK.TYPE: Display method of position (whole) :: Specify the display method of position (whole). (1: Area 2: Zone)
POS_STACK.ZONE_OTHER: Zone other display::Display the zone and others in the position (whole).

ZONE.MIN_WIDTH: The minimum width of the zone

INSTALLATION.WIDTH: RSSI icon width on the installation support screen
INSTALLATION.HEIGHT: RSSI icon height on the installation support screen

DEV.SIMULATION: Use temporary data::Perform position using temporary data.
DEV.SIMULATION_MOVE_PERCENT: Move probability::Set up the move probability as a percentage.
DEV.SIMULATION_MOVE_AREA_PERCENT: Area move probability::Set up the move probability to ignore the area as a percentage.
DEV.ONLY_FROM_DB: (For Test)Use latest data::Without fetching position or sensor info, use only data from database.

EXSERVER.MULTI_API: EXServer 3-point positioning API::Use EXServer's three-point positioning API.
EXSERVER.MAX_DEVICES: EXServer devices::Specify the number of EXBs to measure simultaneously on EXServer.

SUM_AXIS_FILL_GAP.2: 2::Show all search periods for month and day

THERMOH_DISP.icon: icon::Icon that color changes by discomfort index

THERMOH_PATTERN.NUMBER: Numerics::Threshold. This setting applies to values below the threshold. When omitted, it applies when all settings are not applied.
THERMOH_PATTERN.OR: OR::If set, change the threshold decision from less to less.
THERMOH_PATTERN.COLOR: Color code including #::Icon background color. Black when omitted.
THERMOH_PATTERN.PATTERN: String including $::Flashing pattern. Choose WARN or DANGER. Does not flash if omitted.

HUMIDITY_PATTERN.LESS: LESS::Display a warining when you measure humidity under the threshold.
HUMIDITY_PATTERN.MORE: MORE::Display a warining when you measure humidity above or equal to the threshold.

message.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete {target}?
message.completeDeleteConfirm: Are you sure to delete {target} completely?
message.exitConfirm: {target}Are you sure you want to be forced out?
message.overLength: Please enter a string within {length} for {target}.
message.notMatchPasswordRegist: Update password and Confirm password are not matched.
message.notMatchPassword: The changed & confirmation password do not match.
message.csvHeaderRequired: No header in the CSV file.
message.csvDataRequired: No data in the CSV file.
message.csvSameKey: Duplicate update data in the CSV file.
message.csvNotFound: The selected CSV file does not exist.
message.csvNotMatchCharset: Character code of CSV file is different.
message.mapRatioSetting: Sets the ratio of the actual distance (in millimeters) to the size of the map image (in px). First, click in order the two points on the map where you know the actual distance, then set the value in mm in the field of actual width, and press the setting button.
message.unsavedData: OK to discard all unsaved data?
message.bulkUniqueWarn: When exchanging{col}, registered with another{col} and registered again with the correct{col}
message.bulkMultiUniqueWarn: When exchanging the combination of{col}register it with another combination once and register with the correct combination again
message.bulkOneOfFailed: {col} ({value}) must be one of the values of [{candidates}].
message.bulkSizeFailed: {col} ({value}) must be the number of characters {min} to {max}.
message.bulkSizeSameFailed: {col} ({value}) must be no less than {min} characters
message.bulkSystemUseFailed: {col}（{value}）cannot be changed because it is used by system defined name.
message.bulkSystemUseNameFailed: {col}（{value}） is already used by system defined name.
message.bulkSystemUniqueFailed: The system category set up in {col}（{value}）can not be used redundantly in the same area
message.invalidLoginId: Login ID must be alphanumeric character.
message.networkError: Unable to connect to the server.
message.errUploadFileChanged: Reading failed because the file contents have changed. Please reload the screen.
message.noLedDevice: There are no LED devices to operate.
message.providerUserNotAllowed: This function is not available for provider users.
message.noPersonAssociated: This feature is not available because this user has no person associated with it.
message.listEmpty: There are no records matching your request.
message.uploadMax: Upload file size is limited to {target}Mbytes.
message.uploadImgMax: The file size of {key} ({val}) exceeds {target} M bytes.
message.outExb: EXB is located outside the map. Please select the configure device position appropriately
message.outTx: TX is located outside the map. Please select the configure device position appropriately
message.outZone: Zone ({zone}) is located outside the map. Locate the zone at the appropriate coordinates.
message.overSizeZone: The size of Zone ({zone}) exceeds the size of the map. Set up the zone to an appropriate size.
message.loginValidationList: half alphanumberic, underscore( _ ), hyphen(-), at sign(@), dot(.).
message.notMatchedEmail: It is not a mail format. (In case of addition, comma separated)
message.sumTooManyResults: Too many result of sum items. Filter with period or others.
message.selectDisplayColumn: Display the set up item in the table.
message.browserSizeWarn: The browser size is not fit. Set it up on the PC, or in the case of a PC, expand the browser size horizontally.
message.mobileWarn: Use PC to register and edit {name}.
message.lostDetected: <Prohibition of export> {time} {potCd} ({potName}) has not been returned to the specified place.

MSTEAMS.USER_GUIDE1: In order to use EXOffice, you have to grant this application a permission to read your organization's groups and users on your Office365.
MSTEAMS.USER_GUIDE2: Enter your organization name, click the button below and sign in with administrator of Office365. This operation should be done on PC.
MSTEAMS.USER_GUIDE3: You must have an account with an EXOffice. For details please inquire the EXOffice help desk by e-mail exoffice_sup@en2.exeo.co.jp.
MSTEAMS.INVALID_TENANT: To use this EXOffice, a contract is required with WHERE Inc. If you already signed the contract, please let us know.
MSTEAMS.IF_NOT_SHOWN: To show EXOffice, click Sign In button below. If it does not work, try again after reload this page.

helpDescription.updateKey: Not displayed. When updating data, it is used to link with registered information. It can not be changed
helpDescription.delFlg: Not displayed. Use when deleting data when updating data. Set up to 1
helpDescription.enabled: Not displayed. It shows Indicates enabled (1) / disabled (0) status
helpDescription.txXY: Not displayed. If the setting that uses fixed seat, it shows the location information for the area
helpDescription.locationXY: Represents location information for a location
helpDescription.txAreaName: Not displayed. If the setting that uses fixed seat, it shows the target area name
helpDescription.txLocationName: In the case of setting using fixed seats, it indicates the target place name
helpDescription.csvDescription: CSV items may not be displayed even if they are in the following items depending on the contents and options provided
helpDescription.bulkRegister: Formats and registers data using the downloaded file as a template. It can not change the ID of a master that has been issued uniquely and already linked by batch registration. In case of new registration, please empty the ID and do batch registration.
helpDescription.bulkUniqueFailed: Target item name is a non-duplication item. It is already used in another line.
helpDescription.bulkExistFailed: Target item name does not exist. It may have been deleted by another use.
helpDescription.bulkAuthFailed: Target item name can not be used because it is already used internally.
helpDescription.bulkSystemUseFailed: The target item name can not be changed because it is a fixed data used in the system. To continue registration, the target data needs to be deleted from the CSV.
helpDescription.bulkSystemUseNameFailed: The target item name can not be used because it is a fixed name used in the system. It needs to be registered with a different name.

helpIntroduction.notes: If unreadable characters are displayed, garbled characters may have occurred. When using Excel to edit CSV, set the character code of personal settings to SJIS and try.

helpScreenDescription.tenant: You can control the display / non-display of the screen used by the tenant. It is a setting for each tenant.
helpScreenDescription.news: You can create and edit the content of the notice displayed on the login screen.
helpScreenDescription.showPosition: Displays an icon indicating the location of Tx on the area map image. The Tx icon updates the current position periodically at set time intervals. The items (major, minor, name, etc.) set in advance when the Tx icon is clicked are displayed in a balloon.
helpScreenDescription.positionList: Displays a list of Tx location information.Position (map) of the target Tx is displayed from the map display button.The screen location information is updated at regular intervals.
helpScreenDescription.positionStack: Displays Tx position information for each area or zone.Click the Tx icon to display (Position (map)) or (display balloon details of Tx information).The behavior when clicking the Tx icon can be switched in the settings.
helpScreenDescription.enterTable: Displays Tx position information for each area or zone.Click the Tx icon to display (Position (map)) or (display balloon details of Tx information).The behavior when clicking the Tx icon can be switched in the settings.
helpScreenDescription.pirMenu: This screen displays the usage status by area on a map.
helpScreenDescription.thermohumidity: Displays the temperature and humidity in the area in a table format.Click the sensor icon on the area to display the room temperature.
helpScreenDescription.sensorList: Displays registered sensor information in a list.
helpScreenDescription.ledOperation: This screen operate the LED of Beacon.It can control color or blinking.
helpScreenDescription.plan:
Displays the calendar. Compare actuals and schedules.Achievement: Whether a person or thing was at a scheduled place at a specific time
Planned contents: reservation of meeting room, rental of goods, planned places of people, etc.
helpScreenDescription.region: This screen displays a list of region information and allows you to create and edit.
helpScreenDescription.area: This screen displays a list of area information and allows you to create and edit.
helpScreenDescription.exb: This screen displays a list of EXBeacon information and performs creation and editing.
helpScreenDescription.tx: This screen displays a list of Tx information and performs creation and editing.
helpScreenDescription.locationSetting:
This screen is for creating and editing position from the map.You can determine the position by moving while clicking the icon on the map.
After moving the icon, confirm the position with the save button.
helpScreenDescription.locationList: This screen displays a list of position and performs creation and editing.
helpScreenDescription.pot:
This screen displays a list of individual (person, things) information with Tx and creates / edits it.
Connect Tx with an individual.
helpScreenDescription.potPerson:
This screen displays a list of individual (person, things) information with Tx and creates / edits it.
Connect Tx with an individual.
helpScreenDescription.potThing:
This screem displays a list of information on things with Tx, and creates and edits.
Connect Tx with things.
helpScreenDescription.potOther:
This screen displays a list of information on things (others) with Tx, and creates and edits them.
Connects Tx with the Things (other).
helpScreenDescription.category: This screen displays a list of category information and allows you to create and edit.
helpScreenDescription.categoryPerson: This screen displays a list of category information (persons), and creates and edits it.
helpScreenDescription.categoryThing: This screen displays a list of category information (things) and creates / edits it.
helpScreenDescription.categoryZone: This screen displays a list of zone categories and allows you to create and edit them.
helpScreenDescription.categoryAuth: This screeen displays a list of authority information of keys and security areas, and to create and edit.
helpScreenDescription.group:
This screen displays a list of groups and creates and edits them.
Group: Setting to separate individuals
The display set to the group on the map is possible.
helpScreenDescription.user: This screen displays a list of login user information and performs creation and editing.
helpScreenDescription.role: This screen displays a list of role information and performs creation and editing.
helpScreenDescription.zoneClass:
Create and edit zones that include multiple EXBeacons.
The created zone is used for grouping and aggregation by setting it on the EXBeacon screen.
In addition, since categories can be set for zones, it is also possible to classify zones themselves. Please refer to the category help for the categories set in the system to use in the zone.
helpScreenDescription.zoneBlock:
{ZoneBlock} can be created by dragging and selecting on the displayed area.
EXBeacon in the created section will be able to select and set the created zone on the EXBeacon setting screen.
helpScreenDescription.notifyTemplate:
This screen displays a list of notification information and allows to create and edit it.
Set up the template to be notified for each type of notification.
helpScreenDescription.gateway: This screen displays a list of gateway status.
helpScreenDescription.position: This screen displays a list of Tx battery levels and status.
helpScreenDescription.telemetry: This screen displays a list of battery level and status of EXB
